subject: Re: Ebay = NIB RS am/fm digital radio =$2.!!
author: psi_research
full_text:
I was in RS looking for some 469's and have seen these older models. 
I asked the salesperson if I could open one up and they let me 
disassemble it in the store. They have the ribbon connector like the 
470 instead of the pins like the new 469. I went to four different RS 
until I found the new 469 and picked up several of them and modified 
a couple of them. -Bill


--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "M.'s A. Coletta (Mike)" 
<michaelcoletta@...> wrote:
